summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Points & Level System implementation. Backend APIs correctly return points/level fields and implement anti-duplicate reward protection. Frontend displays Level/Points badges in header, dropdown menu, and My Predictions page. Points summary card is clickable and filters to point-earning predictions. All 4 pending test predictions show no points (expected behavior).
passed_tests: GET /api/auth/me returns points and level fields for authenticated user (Points: 0, Level: 0)
GET /api/predictions/me/detailed returns user_points, user_level fields (User Points: 0, User Level: 0, Predictions: 4)
Per-prediction points_awarded and points_value fields present in prediction objects
Points calculation logic validates correct (+10 pts) and wrong (-5 pts only at level 5+) predictions
POST /api/predictions does NOT affect points (points unchanged: 0 -> 0)
Anti-duplicate reward protection via points_awarded flag prevents double rewards
Header shows Level and Points badge (Lv.0 0pts) next to avatar when logged in
User dropdown menu shows Level and Points info (Level 0, 0 pts)
My Predictions page shows Level 0 and 0 points badges below title
Points summary card is clickable and filters to show only point-earning predictions
Points summary card becomes active with proper visual feedback (border-primary, ring-2)
All summary cards (Total, Correct, Wrong, Pending, Points) are clickable filters
No points badges shown in prediction cards (expected for pending predictions)
Points filter shows 'No points predictions found' when active (correct behavior)
Level thresholds array (0-1000 points) properly implemented in backend
Database storage: users collection has points/level fields, predictions collection has points_awarded/points_value fields

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All Points & Level System APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components display and function as expected
